data.eml:eml: Phytoplankton data collected from the North-Western part of the Black Sea during August 1957 (Cruise 1)

The data were collected by the IBSS staff at 18 stations in the North-Western part of the Black Sea during August 1957 (Cruise 1). This dataset contains abundance (individuals per liter) and biomass (mg/m³) data for phytoplankton taxa. No additional metadata is available.
